DOCNAME: CASE OF LASZLO MOLNAR v. HUNGARY
TEXT: CARDINAL . The applicant was born in DATE and lives in GPE .
CARDINAL . On DATE the applicant brought an action against a private individual before ORG , seeking to recover the possession of some specific movable property .
CARDINAL . After several hearings , a judgment was delivered on DATE , which was quashed by ORG on DATE .

CARDINAL . In the resumed proceedings several forensic expert opinions were obtained . CARDINAL hearings had to be rescheduled as the applicant and his representative failed to appear , despite having been duly summoned . On DATE the ORG delivered a judgment . On DATE ORG remitted the case .
CARDINAL . ORG delivered a partial judgment on DATE , which was decided on appeal by ORG on DATE .
CARDINAL . In respect of the respondent 's counterclaim , the first - instance court delivered a judgment on DATE which was upheld by ORG on DATE .
